meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crisp.
meanings.sent1: The crispnesses of the apple made it enjoyable to bite into.
meanings.sent2: I love the crispnesses of freshly washed lettuce in a salad.
meanings.sent3: The crispnesses of the potato chips were so loud, they woke up the cat.
meanings.sent4: The crispnesses of the autumn air signaled the start of a new season.
meanings.sent5: The crispnesses of the snow underfoot made each step feel magical.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being fresh, firm, and dry.
meanings.sent1: The crispnesses of the crackers made them perfect for dipping in soup.
meanings.sent2: The crispnesses of the bread crust indicated it was baked to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The crispnesses of the laundry on the line made it seem like a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The crispnesses of the morning air hinted at a clear day ahead.
meanings.sent5: The crispnesses of the lettuce leaves added a delightful crunch to the sandwich.

meanings.definition: The sound or feeling of something being crunchy or brittle.
meanings.sent1: The crispnesses of the leaves underfoot announced the arrival of fall.
meanings.sent2: The crispnesses of the cereal made breakfast more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The crispnesses of the paper bag being crumpled made everyone turn around.
meanings.sent4: The crispnesses of the toast being buttered filled the kitchen with a comforting aroma.
meanings.sent5: The crispnesses of the chips being eaten echoed through the room.
